BU student from N.H. dies

New England Patriots cheerleader tryouts

Lauren Kelly of Bedford, N.H. smiled while stretching before the start of the auditions today at the Dana Farber Field House in Foxborough. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Heather Brown of Needham stretched before the start of the competition. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Emerson student Kayla Bryan, originally from Kentucky, showed off her flexiblity before the start of the competition. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Megan Mockler of Lincoln, R.I. practiced her heel stretch in the Dana Farber Field House. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Shatia Chesson of Brockton put on her makeup for the competition. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Participants warmed up before the start of the tryouts for the New England Patriots cheerleading squad. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Veteran cheerleader Stephanie Sanchez, center, led a dance routine during the auditions. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Ashley Bousquet of Palmer Mass. stretched before the start of the auditions. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Kendralynn Kohanski of Chepachet, R.I. stretched. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com
Veteran cheerleader Stephanie Sanchez demonstrated a dance routine. Debee Tlumacki for Boston.com

Glute moves
